item.title: Spotless for Java Auto formatting
item.description: https://github.com/diffplug/spotless Gradle Settings Using the plugins DSL plugins { id "com.diffplug.gradle.spotless" version "3.30.0" } ... spotless { java { importOrder 'java', 'javax', 'org', 'com', '' // A sequence of package names googleJavaFormat("1.7").aosp() removeUnusedImports() // removes any unused imports indentWithSpaces(4) // default 4 trimTrailingWhitespace() endWithNewline() } format 'misc', { target '**/*.yml', '**/*.gradle', '**/*.md', '**/.gitignore' indentWithSpaces(2) trimTrailingWhitespace() endWithNewline() } } ... Using legacy plugin application buildscript { ... dependencies { classpath('com.diffplug.spotless:spotless-plugin-gradle:3.30.0') } } .
